txt.en: 'You will need to prepare for the journey, yes? It is a long way to Eriador, and you will need some supplies if you are to have success. Speak to Grimbeorn and he should give you what you will need.'
'I will give you what you will need for your journey. It is a long way across the mountains.'
There are a number of things you will need to bring with you if you are to have a successful journey.
Grimbeorn is outside his lodge, and can give you the supplies you will need to begin your journey.
Talk to Grimbeorn and receive the supplies you will need for your journey
